sect2.title: System Administration
sect2.para: GNOME &version; has new features for system administration.

sect3.title: System Tools
sect3.para: The system tools allow you to configure your system clock and your network connection, as well as manage the users and groups on your system. At present, these system tools are most appropriate for single computers rather than large networks of computers.
GNOME &version; provides a new Services Administration tool, which allows you to choose which services will be started when the computer starts.

sect3.title: Log Viewer
sect3.para: The GNOME log viewer makes investigation easier by showing all logs in one tabbed window and allowing you to browse logs in a calendar. The new version navigator also helps when viewing archived logs.

sect3.title: Menu Editor
sect3.para: GNOME's Applications menu now uses the freedesktop menu specification, so applications can be easily installed regardless of the desktop environment used. GNOME &version; has a simple user interface that lets you edit the menu.
